data.Sentence_cn: 又快捷又舒适
data.Sentence: --- lesson 44  Speed and comfort

data.Sentence_cn: 出远门的人常常需要决定是走旱路、水路，还是坐飞机。
data.Sentence: People travelling long distances frequently have to decide whether they would prefer to go by land, sea, or air.

data.Sentence_cn: 很少有人能够真正喜欢坐几个小时以上的火车。
data.Sentence: Hardly anyone can positively enjoy sitting in a train for more than a few hours.

data.Sentence_cn: 车厢很快就变得拥挤、闷热，
data.Sentence: Train compartments soon get cramped and stuffy.

data.Sentence_cn: 想摆脱开旅途的困扰是很难的。
data.Sentence: It is almost impossible to take your mind off the journey.

data.Sentence_cn: 看书只能解决部分问题。车轮与铁轨间单调的嘎喳声很快就会送你进入梦乡。
data.Sentence: Reading is only a partial solution, for the monotonous rhythm of the wheels clicking on the rails soon lulls you to sleep.

data.Sentence_cn: 白天是忽睡忽醒，
data.Sentence: During the day, sleep comes in snatches.

data.Sentence_cn: 到了夜晚，你真想睡了，却很难入睡。
data.Sentence: At night, when you really wish to go to sleep, you rarely manage to do so.

data.Sentence_cn: 即使你走运弄到一个卧铺，夜间有一半时间你会盯着车顶那盏小蓝灯而睡不着觉；
data.Sentence: If you are lucky enough to get a sleeper, you spend half the night staring at the small blue light in the ceiling,

data.Sentence_cn: 要不然就为查票摸索你的车票。
data.Sentence: or fumbling to find your ticket for inspection.

data.Sentence_cn: 一旦抵达目的地，你总是疲惫不堪。
data.Sentence: Inevitably you arrive at your destination almost exhausted.

data.Sentence_cn: 乘汽车作长途旅行则更加不舒服，因为连看书都几乎不可能。
data.Sentence: Long car journeys are even less pleasant, for it is quite impossible even to read.

data.Sentence_cn: 在公路上还好，你至少能以相当快的速度安全地向前行。
data.Sentence: On motorways you can, at least, travel fairly safely at high speeds,

data.Sentence_cn: 但旅行的大部分时间都花在路上，而且只有很少的服务设施，交通也很拥挤。
data.Sentence: but more often than not, the greater part of the journey is spent on roads with few service stations and too much traffic.

data.Sentence_cn: 相比之下，坐船旅行或环游可以得到文明世界的各种享受。
data.Sentence: By comparison, ferry trips or cruises offer a great variety of civilized comforts.

data.Sentence_cn: 你可以在甲板上伸展四肢、做游戏，还能见到各种有趣的人，能享用各种美味佳肴-当然，这一切只有在大海风平浪静的情况下才有可能。
data.Sentence: You can stretch your legs on the spacious decks, play games, meet interesting people and enjoy good food -- always assuming,of course, that the sea is calm.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果大海肆虐起来，你就可能晕船，那种难受劲儿是任何一种别的旅行的方式都不会带来的。
data.Sentence: If it is not, and you are likely to get seasick, no form of transport could be worse.

data.Sentence_cn: 即使风平浪静，坐船旅行也要占用很长时间。
data.Sentence: Even if you travel in ideal weather, sea journeys take a long time.

data.Sentence_cn: 没有多少人会为享受坐船旅行的乐趣而牺牲假期的时间。
data.Sentence: Relatively few people are prepared to sacrifice holiday time for the pleasure of travlling by sea.

data.Sentence_cn: 飞机以危险而著称，连老资格的旅行者也怕飞机。
data.Sentence: Aeroplanes have the reputation of being dangerous and even hardened travellers are intimidated by them.

data.Sentence_cn: 飞机的另一个缺点是昂贵。
data.Sentence: They also have the disadvantage of being an expensive form of transport.

data.Sentence_cn: 但就速度与舒适而言，飞机是无与伦比的。
data.Sentence: But nothing can match them for speed and comfort.

data.Sentence_cn: 腾云驾雾，在30，000 英尺高空以500英里的时速旅行，这种经历令人心旷神怡。
data.Sentence: Travelling at a height of 30,000 feet, far above the clouds, and at over 500 miles an hour is an exhilarating experience.

data.Sentence_cn: 你不必想办法去摆脱旅途的困扰，因为飞机会迅速地把你送到目的地。
data.Sentence: You do not have to devise ways of taking your mind off the journey, for an aeroplane gets you to your destination rapidly.

data.Sentence_cn: 几小时之内，你躺在扶手椅上，享受着旅途的欢乐。
data.Sentence: For a few hours, you settle back in a deep armchair to enjoy the flight.

data.Sentence_cn: 真正会享受的人还可以在某些航班上看一场电影和喝香槟。
data.Sentence: The real escapist can watch a film and sip champagne on some services.

data.Sentence_cn: 即使没有这些消遣条件，也总是有事可做。
data.Sentence: But even when such refinements are not available, there is plenty to keep you occupied.

data.Sentence_cn: 飞机上，你可以观察世界上非同寻常的奇妙的美景。
data.Sentence: An aeroplane offers you an unusual and breathtaking view of the world.

data.Sentence_cn: 你毫不费劲地飞越高山幽谷，
data.Sentence: You soar effortlessly over high mountains and deep valleys.

data.Sentence_cn: 你确能饱览大地的风貌。
data.Sentence: You really see the shape of the land.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果这种景色被遮住了，
data.Sentence: If the landscape is hidden from view,

data.Sentence_cn: 你便可以观赏一下展现在你面前的、一望数英里的、连绵不断的云海，同时阳光灿烂，天空清澈明朗。
data.Sentence: you can enjoy the extraordinary sight of unbroken cloud plains that stretch out for miles before you, while the sun shines brilliantly in a clear sky.

data.Sentence_cn: 旅途平稳，丝毫不妨碍你阅读或睡眠。
data.Sentence: The journey is so smooth that there is nothing to prevent you from reading or sleeping.

data.Sentence_cn: 不管你打算如何消磨时间，有件事是可以肯定的，即当你抵达目的地时，你感到精神焕发，毫无倦意，
data.Sentence: However you decide to spend your time, one thing is certain: you will arrive at your destination fresh and uncrumpled.

data.Sentence_cn: 用不着因为漫长旅途的辛苦而花几天时间休息来恢复精神。
data.Sentence: You will not have to spend the next few days recovering from a long and arduous journey.
